200.description: OAuth login successful (mobile clients receive tokens)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number (1-based)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Items per page

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter farms by name (case-insensitive)

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: Match address, district, or state (case-insensitive partial match)

parameters.name: minSize
parameters.description: Minimum farm size

parameters.name: maxSize
parameters.description: Maximum farm size

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by verification status

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Filter by produce category the farm grows

parameters.name: sizeUnit
parameters.description: Unit for the provided size filters

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Filter reviews by retailer user ID

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number (1-based)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Items per page

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Optional status filter for produce batches

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by produce name, farm name, or batch ID

parameters.name: harvestFrom
parameters.description: ISO date string: include batches harvested on/after this date

parameters.name: harvestTo
parameters.description: ISO date string: include batches harvested on/before this date

companyName.description: Retailer company name (required when role is RETAILER)

businessAddress.description: Retailer business address (required when role is RETAILER)

companyName.description: Retailer company name (required when role is RETAILER)

businessAddress.description: Retailer business address (required when role is RETAILER)

agencyName.description: Government agency name (required when role is GOVERNMENT_AGENCY)

department.description: Government agency department (required when role is GOVERNMENT_AGENCY)

sizeUnit.description: Unit for the farm size measurement

produceCategories.description: Produce categories grown on the farm

verificationStatus.description: Verification status set by government agency

produceCategories.description: Produce categories grown on the farm

ratingCount.description: Number of reviews contributing to the rating

ipfsUrl.description: IPFS gateway URL pointing to the uploaded certificate.

verifiedOnChain.description: Whether this certificate is verified on-chain

issuedAt.description: When the certificate was issued (if provided).

metadata.description: Arbitrary metadata stored with the certificate

mimeType.description: MIME type of the uploaded file

fileSize.description: Size of the uploaded file in bytes

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the certificate was created

id.description: Unique ID of the QR code

verifyUrl.description: URL used to generate the QR code

imageUrl.description: Image URL of the QR code

isPublicQR.description: Indicates if the QR is publicly shareable

status.description: Current lifecycle status of the produce batch

quantity.description: Recorded quantity of the produce batch

unit.description: Unit used for the recorded quantity

qrCode.description: Data URI for the QR code

sizeUnit.description: Unit for the recorded farm size

verificationStatus.description: Verification status set by government agency

sizeUnit.description: Unit for the farm size measurement

produceCategories.description: Produce categories grown on the farm

onChainClaimId.description: On-chain claim id (uint256) returned by the contract

programsId.description: Associated programs id (must exist if provided)

weatherEventId.description: Weather event id that triggered this request, if any

metadataHash.description: Keccak256 hash (0x-prefixed) of the off-chain claim metadata bundle

qrCode.description: QR code in data URL format that can be rendered directly

message.example: Produce recorded successfully on-chain with QR code and blockchain proof.

isPublicQR.description: Allow anyone to scan this batch QR publicly. Defaults to true.

types.description: Document type for each uploaded document.

verificationStatus.description: Verification status set by a government agency reviewer

certificates.description: One or more certificate files (PDF/image) to pin on IPFS.

types.description: Certification type for each uploaded file. The length must match the number of files.

mimeType.description: MIME type of the uploaded file

fileSize.description: Size of the uploaded file in bytes

programsId.description: Program id that triggered this request, if any

weatherEventId.description: Weather event id that triggered this request, if any

metadataHash.description: Keccak256 hash of off-chain claim payload

onChainClaimId.description: On-chain claim id (as string for bigint safety)

approvedAt.description: Date and time the subsidy was approved

paidAt.description: Date and time the subsidy was paid

evidences.description: Evidence documents uploaded for this subsidy

file.description: Photo or PDF evidence for the subsidy claim

harvestDate.description: Harvest date of the produce batch in ISO format

onChainHash.description: Produce hash stored on-chain for immutability verification

offChainHash.description: Locally computed produce hash for integrity comparison

blockchainTx.description: Blockchain transaction hash where the produce was recorded

batchId.description: Unique identifier of the produce batch

status.description: Current status of the produce record in the system

isPublicQR.description: Indicates if the QR code for this produce is publicly verifiable

produce.description: Off-chain produce details used for verification display

landDocumentTypes.description: Document type for each uploaded document.

ordersThisMonth.description: Count of orders created this month

averageRating.description: Average rating given by the retailer

totalSuppliers.description: Number of farms this retailer has been assigned from

totalOrders.description: Total orders placed by the retailer
